name: shagginess
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being shaggy (= having, or being covered with, or looking like long, rough hair): The men stop shaving a year before the show to achieve the requisite shagginess. The shagginess of hair on the mane and tail and on the legs are characteristics of the breed. See
shaggy
More examplesFewer examples the winter shagginess of the grassThe bison was distinguished, not only by his bulk, but by the superior depth and shagginess of his hair.He trimmed his beard and cut some of the shagginess out of his head.
